ing: 1 orange, peeled and sliced into rounds
1 lemon, peeled and sliced into rounds
1 lime, peeled and sliced into rounds
des: "A favorite wine cocktail. Save some fruit to cut in a round and garnish each glass."
ins:
Mix red wine, brandy, triple sec, lemonade concentrate, orange juice, lemon juice, orange, lemon, and lime in a large pitcher. Refrigerate 8 hours or overnight.
Pour club soda into wine mixture to serve.
